flawed_nl_solution:
On Monday, Shawna was short of 30 - 12 = <<30-12=14>>14 situps
On Tuesday, Shawna was short of 30 - 19 = <<30-19=11>>11 situps
On Wednesday, Shawna would have to do 30 + 14 + 11 = <<30+14+11=55>>55 situps
#### 55

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
